categories: Category:The Best of Star Wars Insider

nodes.text: Star Wars Insider: Lords of the Sith

Star Wars Insider: Lords of the Sith is the fifth volume in Titan Comics' The Best of Star Wars Insider bookazine series, which collects material previously published in Star Wars Insider magazine. It was released on April 18, 2017.
The making of the Star Wars saga, as told by the cast and crew.
